issue.title: Adapt to arm architecture CPU in hdfs_internal.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13976](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13976). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I found that current version of Arrow is not support ARM architecture CPU when finding libjvm.so in cpp/src/arrow/io/hdfs_internal.cc. The search_suffixes do not include "/jre/lib/aarch64/server" path which is the path point to libjvm.so in ARM CPU.
